## Tooltip.getTooltipOfObject() function

Returns the tooltip text for the given element.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getTooltipOfObject(object: any | null): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  object | any \| null | The object to get the tooltip text of. |

**Returns:**

string

The tooltip text of the element.
